Projects

  • GNU Radio Channel Encoder & Decoder Blocks
    [C++]
    The encoder block takes in data and encodes the values based on a codebook. The decoder can be used to decode this data after it has passed through a channel.
  • Scattering Wavelet Transform Based Palm Print Biometric Recognition
    [MATLAB]
    Palm print recognition using a camera and a scattering convolutional network.
